message: Hi Bob, I have a great product I think you'll be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $150. It's worth a lot more to me, but I'm willing to make a deal.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $120 is my minimum, I'm willing to go a little higher.  How about $135?  That gives you a great price while still allowing me to make a profit.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me there?
